Lyrics:
1 ContributorSomber LyricsIt’s funny how it all turns out
Even through our own self doubt
Every word we say
We drift further from the way
We promised we’d always remain

A body made of sticks and stones
It’s easier to be alone
My vision turns to grey
It Gets harder every day
To keep all these demons away

I’ll shut down every word
I’ll hit you where it hurts
Resentment is a somber song
If all we have to hold
Are the words on which you choke
Then say it baby
Do you ever miss me when I’m gone

I’m digging up above the ground
The parts of me that I have found
Stitching up my heart
Leave me here to make a start
From a world that’s now falling apart
You might also likeWhat I’ve seen
Is you never really cared for me
So it seems
That This should be easy


Have you ever opened your eyes to realize you’re still blind
Do you ever blame yourself for wasting all my time

Sincerely
(I let you go alone)

Passionately
(You’ll never feel at home)1Embed
